title: Snowday Singed Recall Animation Bugged
body: Every time I've played singed and used the Snowday skin, his recall animation and sound are a bit delayed and the recall finishes before the animation is done.  It's just confusing when backing because it sounds like you're not done backing yet when you tp back to the fountain.

replies.body:
Hey Deadlyfire! 

Thanks for the report! Looks like this should be resolved for next patch! ^-^
